17#include <stdint.h> // uint*_t
18#include <string.h> // memset, explicit_bzero

20#include "os.h"
21#include "io.h"

23#ifdef HAVE_NBGL
24#include "nbgl_use_case.h"
25#endif
26
27#ifdef HAVE_DEBUG_THROWS
28static char errordata[20];
29
30WEAK void app_throw_info(unsigned int exception, unsigned int lr_val)
31{
32 snprintf(errordata, sizeof(errordata), "n%d, LR=0x%08X", exception, lr_val);
33}
34
35static void review_choice(bool confirm)
36{
37 UNUSED(confirm);
38 os_sched_exit(-1);
39}
40
41#ifdef HAVE_BAGL
42UX_STEP_CB(ux_error,
43 bnnn_paging,
44 review_choice(true),
45 {
46 .title = "App error",
47 .text = errordata,
48 });
49UX_FLOW(ux_error_flow, &ux_error);
50#endif
51
52WEAK void __attribute__((noreturn)) debug_display_throw_error(int exception)
53{
54 UNUSED(exception);
55
56#ifdef HAVE_BAGL
57 ux_flow_init(0, ux_error_flow, NULL);
58#endif
59
60#ifdef HAVE_NBGL
61 nbgl_useCaseChoice(
62 &C_round_warning_64px, "App error", errordata, "Exit app", "Exit app", review_choice);
63#endif
64
65 // Block until the user approve and the app is quit
66 while (1) {
67 io_seproxyhal_io_heartbeat();
68 }
69}
70
71#endif

#define WEAK
